name: Waffles Routine
description:
This game was developed for the Waffle Jam and the Black and White Jam #8 (with the theme of "Loop").

- About

Mr. Kleft came to the Waffles Factory to steal the secret formula... Like always.

But Oven, our most trusted waffles machine, is prepared to prevent that! Again...

Why does this happen so often?

- Credits
  • Game developed by Oscar Moreno (Asdonaur)
  • Font: Nokia Cellphone BC, by Zeh Fernando
  • Sounds by the Nokia 3310 Jam Resources, Asdonaur and various Creative Commons.
- Extras
  • Full OST on YouTube
